mapper.select: with b as (select order_no, sum (order_price) as order_price from order_inf where order_yn ='N' group by order_no) select a.order_no, a.d_day, a.order_prg , a.order_date + 9/24 as order_date, a.cp_code, c.cp_name, order_price from orders a, b, company c where a.order_no=b.order_no and a.cp_code = c.cp_code

select a.order_no , a.d_day, a.order_prg , a.order_date + 9/24 as order_date, a.cp_code, sum(b.order_price) as order_price from orders a,order_inf b where a.order_no=b.order_no and b.order_yn ='W' group by a.order_no, a.d_day, a.order_prg, a.order_date, a.cp_code

select a.order_no, a.d_day, a.order_prg, a.order_date + 9/24 as order_date, a.cp_code, sum(b.order_price) as order_price from orders a,order_inf b where a.order_no=b.order_no and b.order_yn ='Y' or b.order_yn = 'W' or b.order_yn = 'K' group by a.order_no, a.d_day, a.order_prg, a.order_date, a.cp_code

select a.order_no, a.d_day, a.order_prg, a.order_date +9/24 as order_date, a.cp_code, sum(b.order_price) as order_price, c.cp_name, sum(b.order_out_qty) as order_out_qty from orders a, order_inf b, company c where a.order_no=b.order_no and b.order_yn ='K' group by a.order_no, a.d_day, a.order_prg, a.order_date, a.cp_code,c.cp_name
select b.prt_name, a.order_qty, a.order_price, a.prt_code, a.order_no from order_inf a, product b where a.order_no = #{orderNo} and b.prt_code = a.prt_code
select prt_code, sum(order_out_qty)as order_out_qty from order_inf group by prt_code

SELECT a.order_date + 9/24 as order_date, a.order_no, d.cp_name, sum(b.order_qty) as order_qty, b.order_out_qty, a.order_prg, a.d_day, c.prt_name FROM orders a, order_Inf b, product c, company d where a.order_no = b.order_no and b.prt_code = c.prt_code and a.cp_code = d.cp_code and a.order_prg ='배송완료' and b.order_qty<> 0 group by a.order_date, a.order_no, d.cp_name, b.order_out_qty, a.order_prg, a.d_day, c.prt_name

SELECT a.order_date + 9/24 as order_date, a.order_no, d.cp_name, sum(b.order_qty) as order_qty, b.order_out_qty, a.order_prg FROM orders a, order_Inf b, product c, company d where a.order_no = b.order_no and b.prt_code = c.prt_code and a.cp_code = d.cp_code and a.order_prg <> '배송완료' and b.order_qty<> 0 group by a.order_date, a.order_no, d.cp_name, b.order_out_qty, a.order_prg

select c.prt_name, sum(b.order_qty) as order_qty, sum(b.order_out_qty) as order_out_qty, sum(lot_qty) as lot_qty from orders a, order_inf b, product c, lot d where a.order_no =b.order_no and c.prt_code = b.prt_code and c.prt_code =d.mp_code(+) GROUP BY c.prt_name

SELECT TO_CHAR(a.order_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS order_date, d.cp_code, c.prt_name, c.prt_price, b.order_qty, (c.prt_price*b.order_qty) AS order_price FROM orders a, order_Inf b, product c, company d where a.order_no = b.order_no and b.prt_code = c.prt_code and a.cp_code = d.cp_code;
mapper.update: UPDATE order_inf set order_yn = CASE WHEN order_yn = 'N' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END where order_no = #{orderNo} AND prt_code = #{prtCode}
UPDATE order_inf set order_yn = CASE WHEN order_yn = 'W' THEN 'K' ELSE 'W' END where order_no = #{orderNo} AND prt_code = #{prtCode}
UPDATE lot set lot_qty = 0 where out_from = #{orderNo}
UPDATE order_inf SET order_out_qty = order_qty, order_yn= 'K' WHERE order_yn = 'K' AND prt_code = #{prtCode} AND order_no = #{orderNo}
